articles.author: Shishir Gupta
articles.title: Quad leaders to meet tomorrow in Hiroshima, White House confirms - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Hindustan Times had reported about the Quad summit taking place in Hiroshima after Biden had postponed his visit to Australia. | Latest News India
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will participate in the third in-person Quad meeting with US President Joe Biden, Australian prime minister Anthony Albanese and Japan's Fumio Kishida on Saturday in the … [+1899 chars]
